caption.p: FTIR spectrum of crude detergent plants. ( A) Crude methanol extracts; A. concinna ( ---) common absorption at 3338.65, 1620.33 and 1026.26 cm −1, S. rarak ( ---) 3330.55 and 1035.12 cm −1, L. glutinosa ( ---) 2923.23, 1606.13 and 1032.39 cm −1; ( B) Crude water extracts; A. concinna ( ---) common absorption at 3335.52, 1617.86 and 1025.25 cm −1, S. rarak ( ---) 3331.10 and 1034.78 cm −1, L. glutinosa ( ---) 3261.94, 1591.25 and 1033.22 cm −1.
